branchCategory.name: PSE200, Multi-Channel Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, 5 Outputs
branchCategory.description: <p>PSE200 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 4 digit, 1 color display able to manage up to 4 PSE sensors.  The value of any sensor can be selected for display, with an LED indicator showing the channel chosen.  Switch outputs with LED indicators are available for each channel, with 2 outputs for channel 1.  Multiple functions are availabe to optimize the display, switch set points, and security.  PSE200 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 front face rating when panel mounted.</p>

breadCrumb.name: PSE200, Multi-Channel Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, 5 Outputs
